Text: nice size kaos ,has anyone played it . how is it?
its good if your into monkeyisland type stuff, but its very short,
Thanks for this but it doesn't seem to work for me. Everything is fine until I click the exe to play..I can hear the music and stuff but just get a black screen.

Don't download this version, it's a bad rip. The nfo claims to have only removed the "foreign stuff" but in fact all the videos have been ripped, which causes the game to crash to desktop whenever it tries to play them.
The game worked perfectly fine from start to finish for me using the install.exe. Thanks
